summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Download Portal with 5000 seeded items. All requested features working perfectly: statistics display, search functionality (VLC/GIMP), download counters with K/M formatting, file size display, pagination (~101 pages), type filtering, and admin dashboard with seeding capability.
passed_tests: Home page displays 5002 total downloads with stats breakdown by type
Search functionality returns results for 'VLC' (35 instances) and 'GIMP' (29 instances)
Download counter column shows formatted counts (18.7K, 37.4K, etc.)
File size column displays proper formats (GB/MB: 44.2 GB, 1713 MB, etc.)
Description fields show under download names
Download link clicking increments counter (tested and verified)
Type filter buttons work (ALL, Game, Software, Movie, TV Show)
Pagination works with ~101 pages (5002 items / 50 per page)
Submit page has optional file_size and description fields working
Admin dashboard shows database statistics (5002 total, 1502 games, 1200 software, 1300 movies, 1000 TV shows)
Admin can seed database with 5000 items button (functional)
Admin login with password 'admin123' works correctly
Theme editor with dark/light mode and accent colors functional
Submissions management with approve/reject/delete actions working
All API endpoints responding correctly (31/31 backend tests passed)
success_percentage: Backend: 100% (31/31 tests passed), Frontend: 100% (all UI flows working)
